title: New: Avec Sans – The Answer
content: Since exploding on the blogs earlier in the year, London based duo Avec Sans have garnered a host of plays on top Radio stations, as well as a considerable amount of label interest, and it’s not hard to tell why. New single The Answer continues in a similar vein to Heartbreak Hi, a no strings attached booming pop number, that’s perfectly crafted for mainstream success. Check it out below, as well as a disco ready remix by Bill & Will.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
